title: Caravans swallowed by sinkhole
text: Caravans, car swallowed by sinkhole 7:40 AM Trenton Akers, Josh Dutton A SINKHOLE at a popular Sunshine Coast camping spot has grown to 100 metres wide overnight, forcing tourists to evacuate the area. There is more to Istanbul than bazaars 0:00 AM Dilvin Yasa ROMANTIC palaces, bustling clubs and historic Ottoman mansions - the best of Instanbul can be found on its waterways. What travel will look like in 2020 0:00 AM Robyn Ironside National Travel Writer STAFFLESS hotels, space travel and digitally-enabled luggage. On World Tourism Day, we look at how travel has evolved since the 1970s and what’s ahead. The creepy mansion where ideas are born 12:54 PM THOMAS DIMOPOULOS HUMAN tragedy, claims of ghostly apparitions and some of the world’s greatest creative works. This is the secluded compound where they all come together. The race for world’s longest flights 22:00 PM Robyn Ironside National Aviation Writer INTERNATIONAL airlines are making the most of long-range planes to fly passengers direct to far flung destinations around the world. But how far can they go? Inside the world’s scariest hotel 20:45 PM Hana R. Alberts Are you brave enough to stay at the world’s scariest hotel? It may be a dream come true, or your worst nightmare. Flight terror: ‘Flames, the plane shook’ 18:47 PM ALYESHA ANDERSON and KATE CAMPBELL A PERTH man has told of the terror on board a flight from Perth to Hong Kong which was forced to make an emergency landing at Bali’s Denpasar Airport due to an engine fire. This is the best boss in the world 17:54 PM EMMA REYNOLDS YOU can work from a beach with a glass of wine in hand, travel when you want, take three-day weekends and relax if you’re feeling sluggish. This job is awesome.
